definitions.text: a person who lacks knowledge of evil

examples: the principle that one is innocent until proved guilty

definitions.text: lacking intent or capacity to injure

examples: his ingenuous explanation that he would not have burned the church if he had not thought the bishop was in it
American tourists wholly innocent of French
a person unacquainted with our customs
the sentence was devoid of meaning

definitions.text: (used of things) lacking sense or awareness
